name: Arma Et Machina
description:
A cover-based roguelike shooter game. Shoot down as many robots as possible. Cover gives a +2 defense bonus.

Controls:

Numeric keypad: move

F: aim

TAB ( while aiming ): switch targets

F (while aiming ): fire

R: run (move three tiles on your turn instead of one. consumes stamina)

I:open inventory

Enter/Return (while inventory is open ): consume item

S: save game

L: load game
